languages.text: {n}Идира умолкает. В ее глазах появляется настороженный отблеск.{/n} "Странно. Сейчас, когда я сказала это вслух, звучат эти поручения скорее как опыты..."
{n}Idira stops. There is a glint of suspicion in her eyes.{/n} "That's weird. Now that I've said it out loud, those tasks are starting to sound more like tests..."
languages.original_text: {n}Идира умолкает. В ее глазах появляется настороженный отблеск.{/n} "Странно. Сейчас, когда я сказала это вслух, звучат эти поручения скорее как опыты..."

languages.text: {n}イディラが動きを止める。彼女の目には疑いの光がある。{/n}「変ね。声に出して言ってみると、このタスクはまるでテストのように思えてくるわ」
languages.original_text: {n}Idira stops. There is a glint of suspicion in her eyes.{/n} "That's weird. Now that I've said it out loud, those tasks are starting to sound more like tests..."

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラが動きを止める。彼女の目には疑いの光がある。{/n}「変ね。声に出して言ってみると、このタスクはまるでテストのように思えてくるわ」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉住了口，目光中闪烁着怀疑的光芒。{/n}“真奇怪。我大声地说出这些事情之后才发现，这些‘任务’听起来更像是‘测试’……”
languages.original_text: {n}Idira stops. There is a glint of suspicion in her eyes.{/n} "That's weird. Now that I've said it out loud, those tasks are starting to sound more like tests..."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉住了口，目光中闪烁着怀疑的光芒。{/n}“真奇怪。我大声地说出这些事情之后才发现，这些‘任务’听起来更像是‘测试’……”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira se detiene. Hay un brillo de sospecha en sus ojos.{/n} «Qué raro. Ahora que lo he dicho en voz alta, esas tareas empiezan a sonar más como pruebas...».
languages.original_text: {n}Idira stops. There is a glint of suspicion in her eyes.{/n} "That's weird. Now that I've said it out loud, those tasks are starting to sound more like tests..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira se detiene. Hay un brillo de sospecha en sus ojos.{/n} «Qué raro. Ahora que lo he dicho en voz alta, esas tareas empiezan a sonar más como pruebas...».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira hält inne. In ihren Augen funkelt Misstrauen.{/n} "Merkwürdig. Jetzt, wo ich es laut ausgesprochen habe, klingen diese Aufgaben eher wie Prüfungen ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira stops. There is a glint of suspicion in her eyes.{/n} "That's weird. Now that I've said it out loud, those tasks are starting to sound more like tests..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira hält inne. In ihren Augen funkelt Misstrauen.{/n} "Merkwürdig. Jetzt, wo ich es laut ausgesprochen habe, klingen diese Aufgaben eher wie Prüfungen ..."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira s'interrompt, une lueur méfiante dans les yeux.{/n} « Bizarre... En le disant tout haut, comme ça, c'est vrai que ces tâches ressemblent plus à des mises à l'épreuve. »
languages.original_text: {n}Idira stops. There is a glint of suspicion in her eyes.{/n} "That's weird. Now that I've said it out loud, those tasks are starting to sound more like tests..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira s'interrompt, une lueur méfiante dans les yeux.{/n} « Bizarre... En le disant tout haut, comme ça, c'est vrai que ces tâches ressemblent plus à des mises à l'épreuve. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}İdira donakalıyor. Gözlerindeki parıltı, duyduğu şüpheyi saklayamıyor.{/n} "Tuhaf. Şimdi bunları yüksek sesle dile getirince... Bana verdiği işler, aslında kulağa test gibi geliyor."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira stops. There is a glint of suspicion in her eyes.{/n} "That's weird. Now that I've said it out loud, those tasks are starting to sound more like tests..."

traits.locale_text: {n}İdira donakalıyor. Gözlerindeki parıltıda şüphe okunuyor.{/n} "Tuhaf. Şimdi bunları yüksek sesle dile getirince bana verdiği işler aslında kulağa test gibi geliyor..."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
